text: Ricardo Obregón Cano (April 4, 1917 - June 19, 2016)Alejandro Dorrego, Victoria Azurduy, Rodolfo Puiggrós: „El caso argentino: hablan sus protagonistas“, Prisma 1977 was an Argentine Justicialist Party politician. He was born in Río Cuarto, Córdoba. He was Governor of Córdoba from May 25, 1973, to February 28, 1974. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Argentine politicians
title: Ricardo Obregón Cano
